message:
Peta Small
No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, 
or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, 
and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for |
love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.
- Nelson Mandela

Is this true or not? How do you think that correlates to Jeremiah 17:9?
I agree with the first part, about learning to hate.. I disagree with the second part. The only love that comes more naturally to the human heart is the love of self!
